name: My-cv-bootstrap
body:
# Juanma Orta - Resume. AngularJS boostrap format
Welcome to the source code of my interactive resume.
This resume is also a proof of concept of some front-end development skills: **HTML5**, **Javascript**, **CSS**, (and CoffeeScript/SASS as well), **AngularJS** and **responsive layout**.

## Installation:
To make this resume fully interactive, you need to fulfill an easy installation process.
You need to have **[Node.js](http://nodejs.org)**, **[Bower](http://bower.io)** and **[Grunt](http://gruntjs.com)** installed in your computer. 

After you have cloned the repo, you must update the node packages needed:
```
npm install
```

Then download the JS dependencies by typing:
```
bower install
```

Finally, to build the app type:
```
grunt build
```

You'll find the interactive app at *dist/index.html*

## Local server mode
You can also run the CV as a local server, using Node http server features. Just run:
```
grunt serve
```
This instruction will open your favourite browser and point it to the cv website at *http://localhost:9000*
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
